    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Constants
    Constants class to store all the constants used in the game
    Constants.EnemyConstants
    Constants to decide the enemy action and the according sprite
    Constants.PlayerConstants
    Constants to decide the player action and the according sprite
    Constants.UI
    Constats for the User Interface
    Constants.UI.Buttons
     
    Entity
    Entity class that will be the base class for all entities in the game.
    Game
    Main class of the game, used to start the game
    GameMenu
    GameMenu class is a subclass of State and implements StateMethods interface.
    GamePanel
    This class creates a JPanel that we'll use to display our game.
    GameState
    GameState enum is used to keep track of the current state of the game.
    GameWindow
    This class is responsible for the creating the game window, the frame that contains the game panel.
    HidingPlaces
    HidingPlaces class is a subclass of Items class.
    Items
    Items class is a subclass of Entity class.
    Key
    Key class is a subclass of Items class.
    KeyboardInputs
     
    Knife
    Knife class is a subclass of Weapons class.
    Level
    Class used to store level data.
    LevelBase
    Interface used to define the methods that a level must implement.
    LevelFactory
    Class used to create levels.
    LevelManager
    Class used to manage levels in the game.
    LevelOne
    Class that defines the first level of the game.
    LoadSave
    This class is responsible for loading and saving the resources we need (images, sounds, level data, etc.).
    Main
    Main class of the game, used to start the game
    MenuButton
    Class used to create a button in the menu.
    Methods
    This class contains methods that are used in multiple classes.
    MouseInputs
     
    NPCs
    Child class of Entity, used to create NPCs in the game.
    NPCs.Direction
     
    NPCs.NPC_state
     
    NPCs.NPC_type
     
    PatrollingNPC
    Child class of NPCs, used to create NPCs that patrol the level.
    Player
    Child class of Entity, used to create the player in the game.
    Playing
    Playing class is a subclass of State and implements StateMethods interface.
    SampleTest
     
    Stairs
    Stairs class is a subclass of Entity class.
    State
    State class is a superclass for all the game states.
    StateMethods
    StateMethods interface is used to define the methods that each state class should implement.
    Weapons
    Weapons class is a subclass of Items class.
